entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
